title: Bridget Riley
creator_credit: Balfour Films, Arts Council of Great Britain and David Thompson
brief_description: A profile of artist, Bridget Riley. Explores the inspirations she draws from the visual experiences in nature and follows her into her studio where she organises and activates her paintings. Credits include A.A. Englander (photographer) and Roy Ayton (editor).
creator_credit_for_label: Balfour Films, Arts Council of Great Britain and David Thompson
